issue.title: [CF 527] MoP beta bug thread
issue.body:
Date: 2012-08-14 14:52:22
ID: 20
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 2634:
   script ran too long
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2634: LoadOptions()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1830: Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:6118: LockToggle()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:6157: ?()
   ...erface\AddOns\Ace3\AceConsole-3.0\AceConsole-3.0.lua:94: ?()
   ..\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4355: ChatEdit_ParseText()
   ..\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4049: ChatEdit_SendText()
   ..\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4088: ChatEdit_OnEnterPressed()
   [string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1:
      [string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1

The first time I had a "script ran too long" error nothing happened. This time however the editor refused to open. A ui reload later and now only half of TellMeWhen's groups will go into config mode every other time.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #527 | Raw

comments.body:
http://i.imgur.com/DfFX9.jpg

The yellow box isn't that useful if it doesn't close when the number of opening and closing parenthesis actually do match.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

The script ran too long error is something Blizzard has done. I don't know why they thought it would be a good idea, but we can only hope that they remove it for live, or there is going to be a pretty heavy shitstorm.

Well, just did a little research. Looks like shitstorm is imminent: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/6019723577#1

Quote:

Limited lua execution time - In order to keep the game client running smoothly, the lua runtime will break if it is executing a single lua call for too long. This also applies to macros, and will mark the macro as disabled until you reload the UI. Currently this only applies in combat (example: Taint is active).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Parentheses warning box not going a way definitely is a bug, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Could you be more specific about what that shitstorm means?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Rewriting a lot of stuff. Possibly limiting group size to something much smaller.

An addon-wide update (What happens when you toggle locked/unlocked, and a lot of other stuff) may have to update groups one by one instead of all at once, which could cause extreme problems in the cases of meta icons and icon shown conditions checking icons from other groups.

Right now I'm just sitting here waiting impatiently for beta realms to come back up. I'm starting to get a bit stressed now because there are only three weeks until the pre-MoP patch (that includes all of the talent, interface, and other changes) hits, and there is still a lot of bugs to be worked out before TMW is ready for live.

P.s. Parenthesis warning box has been fixed. I

Edited Aug 14, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Should be mostly fixed now. Changes will be in r533


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
